channel.title: Stuff.co.nz - Stuff
channel.description: Top Stories from Stuff.co.nz. New Zealand, world, sport, business & entertainment news on Stuff.co.nz.

item.title: Covid-19 live: Jacinda Ardern announces alert level decision, after 22 new community cases
item.description: The Prime Minister is set to announce if Auckland and the rest of the country will be moving alert levels at 4pm, following the discovery of 22 new Covid cases.
item.dc:creator: Stuff

item.title: Covid-19 NZ: Auckland lockdown alert level decision to be announced at 4pm
item.description: Cabinet faces its toughest call on Covid-19 yet as it decides whether or not to take Auckland out of lockdown.
item.dc:creator: HENRY COOKE

item.title: Covid-19: Where exactly are Waikato's new coronavirus hotspots?
item.description: The new Covid sites sit just south of Auckland's border with Waikato.
item.dc:creator: AARON LEAMAN

item.title: Covid-19: Eliminating Delta from community hard but still feasible, experts say
item.description: Giving up on "stamp it out" strategy would see Covid-19 outbreak reach levels Victoria and New South Wales In Australia are seeing, experts say.
item.dc:creator: DANIELLE CLENT

item.title: Covid-19: 22 new cases ahead of alert level decision for Auckland
item.description: Health officials link truck driver, recent mystery Middlemore cases to outbreak ahead of alert level decision on whether to move Auckland from level 4.
item.dc:creator: HANNAH MARTIN

item.title: NZ Breakers part ways with Tai Webster because of Covid-19 vaccination stance
item.description: Kiwi ANBL club confirms star off-season re-signing won't line up for the 2021-22 season.
item.dc:creator: MARC HINTON

item.title: Saliva testing now available for Timaru border workers
item.description: PrimePort Timaru started offering the method last week.
item.dc:creator: ESTHER ASHBY-COVENTRY

item.title: Police name young woman who died to Manawatū crash
item.description: Palmerston North's Victoria Vivian is the person who died in a crash at Newbury earlier this month.
item.dc:creator: GEORGE HEAGNEY

item.title: Tokyo Olympic Games silver medallist coxswain Caleb Shepherd retires
item.description: Caleb Shepherd helped guide the New Zealand women’s eight to their first Olympic medal last month.
item.dc:creator: IAN ANDERSON

item.title: Covid-19: Suppression granted to pair charged after travelling from Auckland to Wellington in lockdown
item.description: The man and woman are to apply for bail in court later on Monday after they were arrested over the weekend in Wellington.
item.dc:creator: WELLINGTON DISTRICT COURTS REPORTER

item.title: Police to follow up reports of daylight brawl in South Taranaki
item.description: Police have fielded multiple calls about a group fighting on a residential street in South Taranaki, with reports stating some involved were armed with a crowbar and a spade.
item.dc:creator: TARA SHASKEY

item.title: Southland Aquaculture Group welcomes call for seaweed body
item.description: The Southland Aquaculture Working Group has welcomed calls for a national seaweed sector group and governance framework to claim a share of the US$14 billion industry.
item.dc:creator: LOUISA.STEYL

item.title: Covid-19: Pair caught at Auckland border with $100k and a 'boot full' of KFC
item.description: The two men were arrested after a search by police found the money and takeaways.
item.dc:creator: MELANIE EARLEY

item.title: America's Cup: Team NZ's Grant Dalton wants to know who is behind home defence plan
item.description: The Team NZ boss wants Mark Dunphy to reveal who he may have talked to overseas as part of a bid to keep the regatta in the country.
item.dc:creator: TODD NIALL

item.title: Māori rep may gain voting rights on South Wairarapa District Council committees
item.description: Having no vote in advisory meetings limits the “impact and influence” of the Māori Standing Committee, one councillor believes.
item.dc:creator: EMILY IRELAND LOCAL DEMOCRACY REPORTER

item.title: Judge awards neighbours of unfinished Wānaka mansion $27k
item.description: Three Wānaka ratepayers will split $27,007.27 in costs, in a dispute over an unfinished mansion.
item.dc:creator: BLAIR JACKSON

item.title: Quiz: Afternoon trivia challenge: September 20, 2021
item.description: Why do chameleons change colours?
item.dc:creator: SHAHRA HUME

item.title: Margaux Hackett adds to family's proud history with first-time Winter Olympics selection
item.description: Daughter of Kiwi bungy jumping entrepreneur adds to family's high-achieving resume with first-time Winter Olympics selection.
item.dc:creator: STUFF SPORTS REPORTERS

item.title: Groceries worth $1000 stolen from supermarkets in woman's shoplifting spree
item.description: Jahtivah Filipo went into supermarkets across Blenheim on three separate occasions, walking out with more than $1000 in total.
item.dc:creator: MAIA HART

item.title: Business leaders should be cautious giving prescription for Delta
item.description: OPINION: Backers of both elimination and 'living with the virus' could be accused of naivety.
item.dc:creator: TOM PULLAR-STRECKER
